title: Ghostty is now non-profit
summary:
Ghostty, the terminal project, has officially become a non-profit entity, fiscally sponsored by Hack Club, a registered 501(c)(3) non-profit, as of December 3, 2025. This arrangement allows Ghostty to operate as a charitable initiative, leveraging Hack Club's tax-exempt status for compliance, donations, accounting, and governance.

Founder Mitchell Hashimoto stated this move reinforces Ghostty's commitment to being free and open source for everyone. It aims to establish a sustainable development model beyond his personal involvement, offers legal protections to the community, and safeguards against potential "rug pulls" by ensuring the mission cannot be altered or funds diverted for private gain. Hashimoto believes foundational infrastructure like terminals should be stewarded by mission-driven, non-commercial entities.

Technically, nothing changes for Ghostty; its goals, MIT license, and development plans remain consistent. Financially, Ghostty can now accept tax-deductible donations in the United States, enabling compensation for contributors, support for upstream dependencies, community events, and operational costs. All financial transactions will be transparent via Hack Club Bank. Intellectual property associated with Ghostty has been transferred to Hack Club, though individual contributor copyrights are maintained. Mitchell Hashimoto remains the project lead, and critically, no project funds will personally benefit him.

Hack Club, as the fiscal sponsor, receives 7% of all donations to cover administrative costs and support its mission of empowering young people in technology. Hashimoto's family is also making a separate $150,000 donation directly to Hack Club. The article encourages donations, assuring contributors that funds will be used for public-benefit goals.

Ghostty 终端项目已于 2025 年 12 月 3 日正式成为一个非营利实体，由注册的 501(c)(3) 非营利组织 Hack Club 提供财政赞助。这项安排使 Ghostty 能够作为一项慈善倡议运作，利用 Hack Club 的免税地位来处理合规、捐赠、会计和治理事宜。

创始人 Mitchell Hashimoto 表示，此举巩固了 Ghostty 对所有人免费和开源的承诺。它旨在建立一个超越他个人参与的可持续发展模式，为社区提供法律保护，并通过确保其使命不被改变或资金不被挪作私用，防范潜在的“卷款跑路”。Hashimoto 认为，终端等基础架构应由使命驱动的非商业实体来管理。

从技术上讲，Ghostty 没有变化；其目标、MIT 许可和开发计划保持不变。在财务上，Ghostty 现在可以在美国接受可抵税的捐赠，从而能够补偿贡献者、支持上游依赖项、社区活动和运营成本。所有财务交易都将通过 Hack Club Bank 透明化。与 Ghostty 相关的知识产权已转让给 Hack Club，但个人贡献者的版权仍受保留。Mitchell Hashimoto 仍担任项目负责人，至关重要的是，任何项目资金都不会使他个人受益。

Hack Club 作为财政赞助商，将获得所有捐赠的 7%，以支付行政费用并支持其赋能年轻人在科技领域的使命。Hashimoto 的家人还将单独向 Hack Club 捐赠 15 万美元。文章鼓励捐赠，并向贡献者保证资金将用于公共利益目标。

title: Everyone in Seattle hates AI
summary:
The author, building an AI-powered map, observes a striking hostility towards "AI" among Seattle engineers, contrasting sharply with curiosity in other tech hubs. A former Microsoft coworker's intense negativity stemmed not from the author's product, but from pervasive, mandatory, and ineffective AI tools like Copilot 365 forced upon her at work. She revealed a PM was even laid off for "not effectively using Copilot 365," highlighting a punitive culture.

The article details a cultural collapse in Seattle's big tech, especially Microsoft. Post-layoff directives prioritized "AI" classified projects, making others seem irrelevant. Engineers were compelled to use inferior Microsoft AI tools they couldn't fix, fostering widespread frustration. AI teams became a "protected class," while others faced stagnant compensation and poor reviews if they didn't "embrace AI."

This environment has cultivated a harmful belief system in Seattle: AI is useless, and local engineers are unqualified for it. This stifles innovation, leaving engineers in resentment and self-doubt, stalling their careers. Consequently, companies lose innovation, and new AI ventures in Seattle face immediate hostility. The author concludes that despite Seattle's talent, its tech culture now stifles the belief in changing the world, unlike more optimistic tech ecosystems.

文章详细描述了西雅图大型科技公司，尤其是微软，出现的文化崩溃。裁员后的指令优先考虑被归类为“AI”的项目，使得其他项目显得无关紧要。工程师被迫使用他们无法修复的劣质微软AI工具，这培养了普遍的挫败感。AI团队成为“受保护的阶层”，而其他员工如果“不拥抱AI”，则面临薪酬停滞和糟糕的绩效评估。

这种环境在西雅图催生了一种有害的信念体系：AI毫无用处，而本地工程师也无法胜任。这扼杀了创新，让工程师们心怀不满和自我怀疑，阻碍了他们的职业发展。结果，公司失去了创新能力，西雅图的新AI企业也面临着即时的敌意。作者总结道，尽管西雅图人才济济，但其科技文化现在却扼杀了改变世界的信念，这与更乐观的科技生态系统截然不同。

title: Why are 38 percent of Stanford students saying they're disabled?
summary:
The article examines the surprisingly high percentage of students at elite universities claiming disabilities, citing Stanford at 38%, Amherst at 34%, and Brown/Harvard at 20%. The majority of these claims are for mental health conditions like anxiety, depression, and ADHD. The author expresses skepticism, arguing it's "bogus" that such selective institutions would have so many genuinely learning-disabled students, especially when community colleges have far lower rates. Professors often perceive these accommodations as "rich kids getting extra time on tests."

Several factors are suggested for this trend. The Americans with Disabilities Act allows expansive accommodations with little more than a doctor's note. There's a rising tendency to view mental health and neurodevelopmental conditions as identity markers. Online platforms, particularly TikTok, broadly describe these conditions, leading young people to interpret normal struggles (e.g., poor time management, difficulty focusing) as signs of a diagnosable disorder, creating a "deeply distorted view of 'normal'." This is compounded by the DSM's lowered diagnostic bar for ADHD in 2013. Finally, immense risk-aversion and fear of failure among elite students drive them to seek diagnoses and accommodations to avoid bad grades and self-doubt, mistaking typical academic challenges for disabilities. The author concludes that these unnecessary accommodations hinder genuine intellectual growth and the development of crucial coping skills needed for adult life, essentially constituting a form of cheating both against peers and oneself.
chinese_title: 为什么38%的斯坦福学生自称残疾？
chinese_summary:
文章探讨了精英大学学生声称有残疾的比例惊人地高，引用了斯坦福大学38%、阿默斯特学院34%以及布朗大学/哈佛大学20%的数据。这些申报中的大多数是针对焦虑症、抑郁症和注意力缺陷多动障碍（ADHD）等心理健康问题。作者对此表示质疑，认为如此严格录取的学府会有这么多真正有学习障碍的学生是“荒谬的”，尤其是社区大学的比例要低得多。教授们普遍认为，这些特殊照顾不过是“富家子弟在考试中获得额外时间”的手段。

导致这一趋势的因素有以下几点。《美国残疾人法案》规定，仅凭医生证明即可获得广泛的特殊照顾。将心理健康和神经发育状况视为身份标志的趋势日益盛行。在线平台，尤其是TikTok，广泛描述这些状况，导致年轻人将正常的困境（例如时间管理不善、注意力难以集中）解读为可诊断疾病的迹象，从而形成对“正常”的“严重扭曲的看法”。2013年，《精神疾病诊断与统计手册》（DSM）降低了ADHD的诊断门槛，这进一步加剧了上述现象。最后，精英学生中普遍存在的极度规避风险和害怕失败的心态，促使他们寻求诊断和特殊照顾，以避免差成绩和自我怀疑，将常见的学业挑战误认为是残疾。作者总结道，这些不必要的特殊照顾阻碍了真正的智力成长和成年生活所需的关键应对技能的发展，本质上构成了对同龄人和对自己的一种欺骗。

title: It’s time to free JavaScript (2024)
summary:
This article argues that Oracle should release its trademark on "JavaScript," asserting it has been legally abandoned due to both non-use and genericism, causing widespread confusion. The trademark, a relic from Oracle's 2009 acquisition of Sun Microsystems (which initially partnered with Netscape to create JavaScript), is still held by Oracle despite JavaScript becoming the world's most popular programming language, used independently by millions.

The authors contend Oracle has not genuinely used "JavaScript" as a trademark for a core product. References to Node.js (not an Oracle product) and Oracle JET (a set of JavaScript libraries) in a 2019 USPTO filing, along with GraalVM's hidden support for the language, are dismissed as insufficient to demonstrate bona fide use.

Moreover, "JavaScript" has become a generic term. Sun's refusal to release the name for standardization led to the creation of "ECMAScript." Oracle's consistent inaction in enforcing its trademark rights has allowed the term to be used universally, forcing community organizations (like "JSConf") to painstakingly avoid the full name.

The letter urges Oracle, which is believed to have no real business interest in the mark, to voluntarily release it into the public domain. If this request, previously met with silence, is again ignored, the authors, including JavaScript creator Brendan Eich, plan to file a petition for trademark cancellation with the USPTO, seeking community support and pro bono legal assistance.
chinese_title: 是时候解放 JavaScript 了 (2024)
chinese_summary:
本文认为，甲骨文应该放弃其“JavaScript”商标，声称该商标因不使用和通用化而已被合法放弃，造成了广泛的混淆。该商标是甲骨文在2009年收购Sun Microsystems（后者最初与网景公司合作创建了JavaScript）后遗留的产物，尽管JavaScript已成为全球最流行的编程语言并被数百万人独立使用，但甲骨文仍持有该商标。

作者们认为，甲骨文并未真正将“JavaScript”作为其核心产品的商标使用。在2019年美国专利商标局（USPTO）的一份文件中提及Node.js（非甲骨文产品）和Oracle JET（一套JavaScript库），以及GraalVM对该语言的隐藏支持，都被认为是不足以证明其善意使用的。

此外，“JavaScript”已成为一个通用术语。Sun公司拒绝为标准化释放该名称，导致了“ECMAScript”的创建。甲骨文在执行其商标权方面的一贯不作为，使得该术语被普遍使用，迫使社区组织（如“JSConf”）煞费苦心地避免使用完整名称。

信中敦促甲骨文（据信其对该商标没有实际商业利益）自愿将其释放到公共领域。如果这一此前曾被置之不理的请求再次被忽视，包括JavaScript创始人Brendan Eich在内的作者们计划向美国专利商标局提交一份商标撤销申请，并寻求社区支持和无偿法律援助。

title: How elites could shape mass preferences as AI reduces persuasion costs
summary:
Nadav Kunievsky's paper, "Polarization by Design: How Elites Could Shape Mass Preferences as AI Reduces Persuasion Costs," investigates how declining costs and increased precision of AI-driven persuasion technologies could allow political elites to strategically design public opinion. Historically, elites used limited instruments like mass media to influence preferences; AI now makes the distribution of preferences an object of deliberate design.

The author develops a dynamic model where elites choose to reshape policy preferences, balancing persuasion costs with the need to secure majority support. The model reveals that with a *single elite*, optimal interventions tend to pull society towards more polarized opinion profiles – a "polarization pull" – which is accelerated by improved persuasion technology.

However, when *two opposed elites* alternate in power, the same technology incentivizes them to create "semi-lock" regions where opinions become more cohesive and resistant to rival influence. Consequently, advancements in persuasion technology could either heighten or, surprisingly, dampen polarization depending on the specific political environment.

The research concludes that cheaper persuasion technologies transform polarization from an emergent social byproduct into a strategic instrument of governance. This has significant implications for democratic stability as AI capabilities continue to advance, fundamentally altering how political power might be exercised and sustained.
chinese_title: 随着人工智能降低说服成本，精英将如何塑造大众偏好
chinese_summary:
纳达夫·库涅夫斯基的论文《设计极化：随着人工智能降低说服成本，精英如何塑造大众偏好》探讨了人工智能驱动的说服技术如何通过降低成本和提高精准度，使政治精英能够策略性地设计公共舆论。历史上，精英们利用大众媒体等有限工具影响偏好；而现在，人工智能使得偏好的分布成为蓄意设计的目标。

作者开发了一个动态模型，其中精英选择重塑政策偏好，权衡说服成本与争取多数支持的需求。该模型揭示，在存在**单一精英**的情况下，最优干预措施倾向于将社会推向更极化的意见分布——一种“极化拉力”——而改进的说服技术会加速这一过程。

然而，当**两个对立精英**轮流执政时，同样的技术会促使他们创建“半锁定”区域，使民众意见更加凝聚，并抵制对手的影响。因此，说服技术的进步可能加剧，或者出人意料地，抑制极化，这取决于具体的政治环境。

该研究总结，更廉价的说服技术将极化从一种新兴的社会副产品转变为一种战略性的治理工具。随着人工智能能力的不断进步，这对于民主稳定具有深远影响，从根本上改变了政治权力可能被行使和维持的方式。

title: I ignore the spotlight as a staff engineer
summary:
A Senior Staff Engineer at Google, the author challenges Sean Goedecke's "spotlight" model for Staff+ engineers, proposing an alternative path optimizing for systems and stewardship over fungibility. Unlike product teams driven by quarterly shifts and external customers, the author works in developer tools and infrastructure, serving internal engineers. Here, success is "bottom-up," built on deep context and long-term ownership, rather than executive whims.

Stewardship offers compounding returns: efficiency through pattern matching and systemic innovation. The author's Bigtrace project, a distributed query engine processing billions of traces monthly, emerged from years of observing problems, a feat impossible with frequent team rotations. This long-term trust also grants the political capital to say "No" to volatile, high-visibility projects (like rushed AI integration into Perfetto) that threaten product quality and user trust.

Career progression isn't reliant on executive visibility. Instead, an "alternate currency of impact" emerges: a "shadow hierarchy" where advocacy from critical customer teams (e.g., Pixel engineers needing Perfetto) fuels promotions, and a "utility ledger" tracks engineering health metrics like bugs fixed, criticality, ubiquity, and scale. These provide a robust, technically-driven promotion case.

This approach aligns with Will Larson's Architect or Tech Lead archetypes. While acknowledging initial luck in finding such a team, the author stresses that staying is a choice, and these less-visible, stable infrastructure teams are more common than perceived, offering deep technical ownership for those willing to forgo external validation. The path emphasizes depth, patience, and building lasting foundations over chasing the spotlight.
chinese_title: 作为资深工程师，我不爱出风头。
chinese_summary:
谷歌的一位高级资深工程师，作者挑战了Sean Goedecke关于Staff+工程师的“聚光灯”模型，提出了一个替代路径，该路径侧重于系统和管理职责，而非可替代性。与受季度变化和外部客户驱动的产品团队不同，作者在开发者工具和基础设施领域工作，服务于内部工程师。在这里，成功是“自下而上”的，建立在深厚的背景知识和长期所有权之上，而非高层领导的突发奇想。

尽责管理带来复利效应：通过模式匹配和系统性创新提升效率。作者的Bigtrace项目是一个每月处理数十亿条追踪的分布式查询引擎，是多年观察问题后诞生的，如果团队频繁轮岗，这将是不可能完成的壮举。这种长期信任也赋予了政治资本，使其能够对那些不稳定、高知名度的项目（例如将AI仓促整合到Perfetto中）说“不”，这些项目会威胁产品质量和用户信任。

职业发展不依赖于高层的可见性。取而代之的是一种“影响力替代货币”的出现：一个“影子层级”，其中关键客户团队（例如需要Perfetto的Pixel工程师）的拥护推动着晋升，以及一个“效用分类账”，它跟踪工程健康指标，如修复的bug数量、关键性、普适性和规模。这些共同提供了一个强大且技术驱动的晋升依据。

这种方法与Will Larson的架构师或技术主管原型相符。作者承认最初找到这样的团队有运气成分，但他强调留下是一种选择，而且这些不那么显眼但稳定的基础设施团队比人们想象的更常见，为那些愿意放弃外部认可的人提供了深厚的技术所有权。这条路径强调深度、耐心，以及构建持久基础，而非追逐聚光灯。

title: Transparent leadership beats servant leadership
summary:
The author, drawing from personal management experience, critiques "servant leadership," likening it to "curling parenting." While initially comfortable for direct reports, this approach can make the leader an overworked, single point of failure. Ultimately, it leaves teams ill-equipped to handle future obstacles, isolated, and lacking purpose once the leader departs.

As an alternative, the author proposes "transparent leadership," a model focused on empowering teams and making the leader redundant. A transparent leader achieves this by:
*   Coaching and connecting team members.
*   Teaching methodical problem-solving.
*   Explaining organizational values and principles to enable independent, aligned decision-making.
*   Creating direct links between supply and demand, rather than acting as a middleman.
*   Fostering career growth by gradually transferring leadership responsibilities.
*   Continuously training their own replacement.

Once a leader successfully makes themselves redundant, the article suggests that instead of inventing new work, demanding status reports, or creating bureaucracy, the optimal response is to return to technical problems. This keeps the manager's skills fresh, garners respect from their team, and allows them to function as a "high-powered spare worker" rather than a paper-shuffler. This approach prioritizes long-term team autonomy and resilience.
chinese_title: 透明领导力胜过仆人式领导力
chinese_summary:
作者结合个人管理经验，批判了“仆人式领导”，将其比作“直升机式育儿”。这种方式虽然起初让下属感到舒适，但可能导致领导者工作过量，成为单一故障点。最终，一旦领导者离职，团队将缺乏应对未来障碍的能力，变得孤立无援，并失去目标。

作为替代方案，作者提出了“透明领导”——一种旨在赋能团队并让领导者变得可有可无的模型。透明领导者通过以下方式实现这一目标：
*   辅导并连接团队成员。
*   传授系统的问题解决方。
*   解释组织价值观和原则，使团队能够独立地做出符合方向的决策。
*   在供给和需求之间建立直接联系，而非充当中间人。
*   通过逐步移交领导职责来促进职业成长。
*   持续培养自己的接班人。

title: Netflix’s AV1 Journey: From Android to TVs and Beyond
summary:
Netflix's AV1 video codec now powers 30% of its total streaming, a substantial increase from its initial 10% adoption on Android in 2020. This expansion highlights AV1's superior compression efficiency, which delivers better visual quality at lower bitrates compared to older codecs like AVC and HEVC. This translates to data savings for users and reduced bandwidth costs for Netflix.

The initial rollout focused on Android devices to improve streaming in bandwidth-constrained mobile environments. However, the recent growth to Smart TVs, streaming sticks, and game consoles has been enabled by the increasing availability of dedicated hardware AV1 decoders. AV1 is computationally intensive, making hardware acceleration critical for efficient playback, especially on power-sensitive devices. Netflix actively collaborated with SoC vendors and device manufacturers to ensure widespread AV1 hardware support across various platforms.

This strategic move allows more users to benefit from AV1's quality advantages, particularly in areas with fluctuating network conditions. Netflix continues to optimize its AV1 encoding pipelines and plans to extend its deployment to even more content and devices as hardware support becomes ubiquitous, further enhancing the quality of experience and achieving greater operational efficiencies.

title: Microsoft drops AI sales targets in half after salespeople miss their quotas
summary:
Microsoft has significantly lowered sales growth targets for its AI agent products after numerous salespeople missed their quotas in the last fiscal year. This unusual adjustment comes after the company failed to meet ambitious sales goals for its "agentic" AI offerings, designed for autonomous, multi-step tasks like generating dashboards or writing reports, and featured heavily in products like Microsoft 365 Copilot and Azure AI Foundry.

Sales figures reveal the struggle: an Azure sales unit's 50% growth quota for its Foundry product was met by less than a fifth of its salespeople, leading to a target reduction to 25%. Another unit saw targets cut from doubling sales to 50%. These indicate enterprises are reluctant to pay premium prices for these tools. Furthermore, Microsoft's Copilot faces brand preference issues, with many employees, such as those at drugmaker Amgen, reportedly favoring OpenAI's ChatGPT for general tasks and using Copilot mainly for Microsoft-specific applications.

The article suggests a fundamental problem: current AI agent technology may not be ready for the high-stakes autonomous business work Microsoft promises. AI models are prone to "confabulation" (confidently generating false outputs) and exhibit "brittleness," struggling with novel problems outside their training data, making them unreliable for critical tasks. This explains the appeal of Artificial General Intelligence (AGI), a more capable, but currently elusive, system.

Despite these sales challenges, Microsoft continues record capital expenditures on AI infrastructure. Much of its AI revenue, however, currently stems from other AI companies renting cloud services rather than widespread adoption by traditional enterprises. Microsoft appears to be building for an AI revolution that many businesses have yet to fully embrace.

文章指出一个根本性问题：当前的AI代理技术可能尚未准备好承担微软所承诺的、高风险的自主商业工作。AI模型容易出现“虚构”（confabulation，即自信地生成虚假输出）以及“脆弱性”（brittleness），难以处理训练数据之外的新颖问题，这使得它们在关键任务中不可靠。这解释了通用人工智能（AGI）的吸引力，它是一个能力更强但目前仍难以实现的系统。

title: The US polluters that are rewriting the EU's human rights and climate law
summary:
The article exposes a powerful, often secretive, lobbying campaign by major US corporations and their European affiliates to significantly weaken the European Union's Corporate Sustainability Due Diligence Directive (CSDDD). Led by groups like BusinessEurope and AmCham EU, and including giants such as ExxonMobil, Chevron, Microsoft, Apple, and BlackRock, these entities have exerted immense pressure on EU institutions.

Their primary goal is to dilute provisions that would hold companies accountable for human rights abuses and environmental damage across their global supply chains. Through extensive lobbying, private meetings, and threats of reduced investment, they have successfully pushed for the exclusion of the financial sector from the directive's scope, weakened civil liability provisions, reduced the number of companies covered, and watered down climate plan requirements.

The article argues that this "secretive cabal" has already substantially undermined the CSDDD's original ambition to ensure corporate responsibility, allowing companies to avoid accountability for issues like child labor, deforestation, and pollution. The author warns that if further weakened, the directive will fail to protect vulnerable communities and the environment, enabling powerful corporations to continue operating with impunity.

title: Thoughts on Go vs. Rust vs. Zig
summary:
The author explores Go, Rust, and Zig by examining the values and trade-offs embedded in their design, rather than just feature lists. This perspective aims to clarify their distinct purposes despite functional overlaps.

**Go** is highlighted for its minimalism, akin to a "modern C." Its limited feature set (e.g., late generics, no tagged unions) prioritizes code stability, readability, and ease of understanding, especially for concurrent programming. Go simplifies memory management through garbage collection and flexible slice types, making it ideal for corporate collaboration and broad applicability.

**Rust** is described as maximalist, striving for "zero-cost abstractions" to deliver both memory safety and performance. Its complexity arises from numerous concepts and a demanding type system that requires developers to explicitly express runtime behavior for compile-time safety checks. This rigor prevents undefined behavior (UB), providing strong code guarantees, though it steepens the learning curve.

**Zig**, the newest, offers ultimate programmer control, contrasting Go's abstractions and Rust's strictness. It features explicit manual memory management with customizable allocators and actively eschews object-oriented programming (OOP) features like private fields and dynamic dispatch in favor of data-oriented design. Zig detects "illegal behavior" at runtime, with configurable checks. Its design encourages managing memory in large chunks rather than tying allocations to small objects, presenting a "subversive" approach that challenges traditional OOP paradigms.
chinese_title: 关于 Go、Rust 和 Zig 的思考
chinese_summary:
作者通过审视Go、Rust和Zig设计中蕴含的价值观和权衡取舍，而非仅仅罗列功能特性，来探讨这三种语言。这种视角旨在阐明它们在功能上虽有重叠，却各自拥有独特的目标。

**Go**语言以其极简主义而著称，类似于“现代C语言”。其有限的功能集（例如，较晚引入泛型、没有带标签的联合体）优先考虑代码的稳定性、可读性和易懂性，尤其是在并发编程方面。Go通过垃圾回收和灵活的切片类型简化内存管理，使其非常适合企业协作和广泛应用。

**Rust**被描述为“极致主义者”，致力于实现“零成本抽象”，以兼顾内存安全和性能。它的复杂性源于其众多的概念和一个要求严苛的类型系统，该系统要求开发者明确表达运行时行为，以进行编译时安全检查。这种严谨性阻止了未定义行为（UB），提供了强大的代码保证，尽管这增加了学习曲线的难度。

最新的**Zig**语言提供了极致的程序员控制权，与Go的抽象和Rust的严格性形成对比。它具有显式的手动内存管理和可定制的内存分配器，并积极摒弃面向对象编程（OOP）特性，如私有字段和动态分派，转而青睐数据导向设计。Zig在运行时检测“非法行为”，并提供可配置的检查。其设计鼓励以大块方式管理内存，而不是将内存分配与小对象绑定，呈现出一种“颠覆性”方法，挑战了传统的OOP范式。

title: RAM is so expensive, Samsung won't even sell it to Samsung
summary:
RAM prices are skyrocketing due to an "AI" bubble, causing a supply crunch and making memory chips extremely expensive. This has led to a remarkable situation where Samsung Semiconductor Global, a major memory manufacturer, reportedly rejected a long-term order for smartphone DRAM chips from its own corporate sibling, Samsung Electronics' Mobile Experience division.

Samsung Electronics, which makes Galaxy phones, sought supply for its 2026 flagship designs but was forced to renegotiate quarterly at higher prices. Samsung Semiconductor is prioritizing lucrative "AI" data center clients, who are willing to pay premium prices, over its internal partner.

This "chipflation" is expected to result in higher prices for Samsung phones and other mobile devices for consumers. The issue extends beyond Samsung, with Raspberry Pi raising prices due to memory costs and Lenovo stockpiling supplies. Component prices have recently tripled, causing finished memory modules to double in price in a single month. Experts anticipate continued price increases into next year, with supply constraints potentially lasting until 2027 or later.

title: BMW PHEV: Safety fuse replacement is extremely expensive
summary:
The article "BMW PHEV: Safety fuse replacement is extremely expensive" critically examines BMW's design for a high-voltage safety fuse in their 2021 330e G20 plug-in hybrid electric vehicle (PHEV). After a minor frontal collision (around 20km/h), the vehicle's high-voltage system tripped its internal safety fuse, the IBMU CP 21F37E, rendering the car inoperable.

BMW's official position states that this particular fuse is not a replaceable component. Instead, its failure requires replacing the *entire high-voltage battery pack*. The cost for this replacement battery alone is a staggering €26,000, excluding labor, shipping, and taxes. Given the car's market value of €35,000-€40,000, this repair cost is deemed economically unfeasible, effectively making even minor collision damage a write-off.

The author strongly criticizes this engineering choice as "unrepairable" and wasteful, contrasting it sharply with other manufacturers like Tesla, where similar battery fuses can be replaced individually for a few hundred euros. The article argues that BMW's design promotes planned obsolescence, generates unnecessary electronic waste, and goes against principles of sustainability and EU repairability regulations, calling it a significant design flaw.

title: Show HN: I built a dashboard to compare mortgage rates across 120 credit unions
summary:
FinFam has launched a dashboard to help consumers compare mortgage rates from over 120 credit unions across the United States. This tool addresses the challenge of finding competitive rates from member-owned, non-profit credit unions, which often offer better deals than big banks whose higher rates frequently subsidize marketing.

The dashboard provides daily-updated rates for 30-Year and 15-Year Fixed mortgages, displaying best, good, and median Annual Percentage Rates (APRs), along with comparisons to national averages. For instance, as of December 4, 2025, the best 30-Year Fixed APR was 5.49% (-70 bps vs. National Avg) and the best 15-Year Fixed APR was 4.98% (-46 bps vs. National Avg).

The developer's motivation stemmed from personal experience, saving 1.5% APR by opting for a credit union over a big bank. The tool aims to highlight that standardized mortgage products shouldn't have vast price differences due to marketing budgets. Rates are collected from credit union websites, and national benchmarks are sourced from the St. Louis Federal Reserve.

Users are encouraged to utilize the dashboard to identify potential lenders, obtain personalized quotes (factoring in credit score, down payment, and points), and protect their privacy with services like optoutprescreen.com before credit checks. FinFam asserts its independence, does not receive referral fees, and provides rates for informational purposes only, stressing that actual rates will vary. The goal is to help people discover options and save significant money.

title: The RAM shortage comes for us all
summary:
The article highlights a severe and rapidly escalating RAM shortage, driving unprecedented price inflation across the industry. The author notes a personal experience of a 64GB DDR5 kit tripling in price from $209 to $650 in months.

This shortage is impacting everyone: Raspberry Pi has increased prices and introduced a lower-spec model, Micron is discontinuing the Crucial brand, Samsung struggles to source RAM for its own phones, and small vendors face price hikes of 200-300% even for older memory tech. PC builders are already seeing DDR4 prices jump from $30 to $120 and DDR5 from $150 to $500 for 64GB. Libre Computer reports a single 4GB LPDDR4 module costing $35, exceeding all other components in some of their SBCs.

The primary cause is the massive buildout of AI datacenters. Major memory manufacturers are prioritizing high-margin AI-specific RAM (like HBM), neglecting and even shutting down consumer memory lines. Even GPU board manufacturers are reportedly being told by Nvidia to source their own VRAM.

The hopeful "AI bubble burst" scenario, where cheap hardware floods the market, is unlikely to benefit consumers. The RAM and associated hardware are specialized (integrated into unique GPUs or HBM modules), not compatible with standard PCs, and require immense infrastructure (power/cooling) beyond typical homelabs.

This situation threatens to gut the PC building hobby, make SBCs prohibitively expensive, and leave many in a lurch. Companies like Lenovo are already stockpiling RAM, exacerbating shortages that echo the 2020 toilet paper crisis and 2021-2022 chip shortages. The author concludes that this "AI bubble" is imposing a hidden "AI tax" on nearly all electronics, with no clear end in sight.
chinese_title: 内存短缺无人幸免

本文强调了严峻且迅速升级的RAM短缺，正在推动整个行业前所未有的价格上涨。作者指出，他个人经历了一套64GB DDR5套件在数月内从209美元飙升至650美元，价格翻了三倍。

此次短缺正在影响所有人：树莓派（Raspberry Pi）已提高价格并推出了低规格型号；美光（Micron）正在停产其Crucial品牌；三星（Samsung）难以为其自有手机采购RAM；甚至小型供应商也面临着旧内存技术200-300%的价格上涨。PC组装商已经看到64GB的DDR4价格从30美元飙升至120美元，DDR5则从150美元飙升至500美元。Libre Computer报告称，一个4GB LPDDR4模块的成本高达35美元，超过了其某些单板计算机（SBC）中所有其他组件的总和。

主要原因是人工智能数据中心的大规模建设。主要内存制造商正在优先生产高利润的人工智能专用RAM（如HBM），忽视甚至关闭了消费级内存生产线。据报道，甚至GPU板卡制造商也被英伟达（Nvidia）告知要自行采购显存（VRAM）。

人们所期望的“AI泡沫破裂”场景——即廉价硬件涌入市场——不太可能让消费者受益。这些RAM及相关硬件都是专业化的（集成在独特的GPU或HBM模块中），与标准PC不兼容，并且需要超出典型家庭实验室的巨大基础设施（电力/散热）。

这种情况威胁到PC DIY爱好，使单板计算机（SBC）价格高昂得令人望而却步，并让许多人陷入困境。联想（Lenovo）等公司已经开始囤积RAM，加剧了短缺，这与2020年的卫生纸危机和2021-2022年的芯片短缺如出一辙。作者总结说，这个“AI泡沫”正在对几乎所有电子产品征收一种隐性的“AI税”，而且看不到明确的结束迹象。

title: Django 6
summary:
Django 6.0, released December 3, 2025, brings substantial updates and some backwards incompatible changes. It now supports Python 3.12, 3.13, and 3.14, discontinuing support for Python 3.10 and 3.11, and drops support for MariaDB 10.5.

Key new features include built-in Content Security Policy (CSP) support, making it easier to protect against content injection attacks via settings like `SECURE_CSP` and a `csp()` context processor. The Django Template Language gains "Template Partials" (`{% partialdef %}` and `{% partial %}`) for encapsulating and reusing template fragments, enhancing modularity. A new, built-in Tasks framework allows offloading work outside the HTTP request-response cycle to background workers, handling task definition, validation, and queuing. Email handling has been updated to use Python’s modern `email.message.EmailMessage` API, offering a cleaner, Unicode-friendly interface.

Minor features include the adoption of Font Awesome 6.7.2 for admin icons, increased PBKDF2 password hasher iterations, new GIS functionalities (e.g., `Rotate` function, MariaDB 12.0.1+ support for `coveredby`), `Lexeme` expression for PostgreSQL full-text search, and the `StringAgg` and `AnyValue` aggregates now available across more databases. Asynchronous pagination is introduced with `AsyncPaginator`.

Significant backwards incompatible changes include `DEFAULT_AUTO_FIELD` now defaulting to `BigAutoField`, which may require explicit configuration for older projects. Custom ORM expressions must now return parameters as a tuple from their `as_sql()` method.

Finally, Django 6.0 begins deprecating positional arguments for optional parameters in `django.core.mail` APIs, requiring keyword arguments instead.

title: Cloudflare outage on December 5, 2025
summary:
On December 5, 2025, Cloudflare experienced an outage lasting approximately 25 minutes (08:47 to 09:12 UTC), affecting about 28% of its HTTP traffic. This was not a cyberattack but resulted from internal configuration changes related to mitigating an industry-wide vulnerability (CVE-2025-55182) in React Server Components.

The incident began when Cloudflare attempted to increase its Web Application Firewall (WAF) buffer size. During this process, an internal WAF testing tool was disabled via a rapid, global configuration system. This change, applied instantly across the network, triggered a bug in Cloudflare's older FL1 proxy. The system attempted to apply a "killswitch" to a rule with an "execute" action, which unexpectedly caused a Lua exception ("attempt to index field 'execute' (a nil value)") due to a missing object.

Customers using the older FL1 proxy alongside the Cloudflare Managed Ruleset were impacted, receiving HTTP 500 errors. This specific code error had existed undetected for years and is not present in their newer Rust-based FL2 proxy.

Cloudflare acknowledged this was the second significant outage in weeks, following a similar incident on November 18. Critical mitigation changes promised after the previous event, such as enhanced rollouts and "fail-open" error handling, had not yet been fully deployed. Cloudflare has since locked down all network changes and apologized for the repeated disruption to its customers and the Internet.

事件始于Cloudflare尝试增加其Web应用防火墙（WAF）的缓冲区大小。在此过程中，一个内部WAF测试工具通过一个快速、全局的配置系统被禁用。这一立即应用于全网络的更改，触发了Cloudflare较旧的FL1代理中的一个错误。系统试图对一个带有“execute”动作的规则应用“killswitch”（紧急关闭开关），由于缺少对象，意外地导致了Lua异常（“attempt to index field 'execute' (a nil value)”）。

使用较旧FL1代理以及Cloudflare托管规则集的用户受到了影响，收到了HTTP 500错误。这个特定的代码错误已存在多年未被发现，并且不存在于他们较新的基于Rust的FL2代理中。

title: Multivox: Volumetric Display
summary:
Multivox is a software project designed to drive custom volumetric displays, namely Rotovox and Vortex. These devices feature two 128x64 HUB75 LED panels spinning around a vertical axis, controlled by a Raspberry Pi 4. Rotovox uses vertically arranged panels for higher vertical resolution, while Vortex has horizontally arranged panels for brighter output and higher refresh rates, with 3D printable parts available.

The software architecture consists of a `driver` that creates and scans a voxel buffer in shared memory, synchronized with rotation via a GPIO sensor, and `client` code that generates content and writes to this buffer. Both are designed to run on the same Raspberry Pi, with input from a Bluetooth gamepad and audio via Bluetooth.

The project includes various `toys` (demos) like `tesseract` and `fireworks`, utility scripts in `python` for calibration and model conversion, and a `simulator` (virtex) that renders the voxel buffer to an X11 window, allowing development without physical hardware.

Building involves cloning the repository and using CMake to configure for either `vortex` or `rotovox`. The driver (`sudo ./vortex`) must run first, providing diagnostics and accepting keyboard input for settings like bit depth, uniformity, and trails. Client applications, like `./tesseract` or `./viewer`, then interact with the shared voxel buffer.

For automatic startup, Multivox can be installed to `~/Multivox` and configured as a systemd service for the driver (`vortex.service`) and a cron job for the `multivox` launcher. The Multivox front end acts as a fantasy console, displaying installed `.mct` applications as cartridges with saved preview snapshots.

title: Trick users and bypass warnings – Modern SVG Clickjacking attacks
summary:
The article introduces "SVG clickjacking," a novel technique leveraging SVG filters to enable complex, interactive clickjacking attacks and data exfiltration within cross-origin iframes, surpassing the limitations of classic clickjacking. The author's discovery hinges on SVG filter primitives like `<feColorMatrix>`, `<feDisplacementMap>`, `<feComposite>`, and `<feBlend>` to visually manipulate framed content without directly accessing its data.

Key attack primitives and capabilities demonstrated include:
*   **Fake Captcha:** Utilizing `feDisplacementMap` to distort text in an iframe, forcing users to retype sensitive codes for exfiltration.
*   **Grey Text Hiding & Masking:** A sophisticated chain of filters can selectively hide placeholder text, sculpt input fields, and modify their appearance, tricking users into entering specific data.
*   **Pixel Reading:** By cropping and tiling specific pixels, and applying arithmetic operations with `feComposite`, the attack can detect pixel colors. This enables dynamic, responsive attacks like hover effects, fake dropdowns, and form validation, all reacting to the iframe's visual state.
*   **Logic Gates:** Critically, the author shows that `feBlend` and `feComposite` can implement all fundamental logic gates (NOT, AND, OR, XOR). This functional completeness allows SVG filters to be programmed for arbitrary logic, enabling highly complex, stateful attacks—even demonstrating a basic calculator (full adder) entirely within the SVG filter.

While direct data exfiltration *out* of the SVG context is not possible, the ability to program intricate interactive logic makes SVG clickjacking a potent tool for sophisticated user deception and interaction manipulation. The technique is primarily effective on Chrome and Firefox.
chinese_title: 欺骗用户、绕过警告：现代 SVG 点击劫持攻击
chinese_summary:
本文介绍了一种名为“SVG点击劫持”的新颖技术，该技术利用SVG滤镜在跨域iframe中实现复杂的交互式点击劫持攻击和数据窃取，超越了传统点击劫持的局限性。作者的发现核心在于SVG滤镜基元，如`<feColorMatrix>`、`<feDisplacementMap>`、`<feComposite>`和`<feBlend>`，它们能够在不直接访问其数据的情况下，视觉上操纵被嵌入的内容。

本文展示的关键攻击原语和能力包括：
*   **伪造验证码：** 利用`feDisplacementMap`扭曲iframe中的文本，强迫用户重新输入敏感代码以窃取数据。
*   **灰色文本隐藏与遮蔽：** 一系列复杂的滤镜可以有选择地隐藏占位符文本、塑造输入字段并修改其外观，从而欺骗用户输入特定数据。
*   **像素读取：** 通过裁剪和平铺特定像素，并利用`feComposite`应用算术运算，攻击可以检测像素颜色。这使得动态、响应式攻击成为可能，例如悬停效果、伪造下拉菜单和表单验证，所有这些都根据iframe的视觉状态做出反应。
*   **逻辑门：** 至关重要的是，作者展示了`feBlend`和`feComposite`可以实现所有基本的逻辑门（非、与、或、异或）。这种功能完备性允许SVG滤镜进行任意逻辑编程，从而实现高度复杂、有状态的攻击——甚至完全在SVG滤镜内演示了一个基本计算器（全加器）。

虽然无法直接从SVG上下文外部窃取数据，但编程复杂交互逻辑的能力使SVG点击劫持成为一种强大的工具，用于复杂的用于欺骗和交互操纵。该技术主要在Chrome和Firefox浏览器上有效。

title: Kenyan court declares law banning seed sharing unconstitutional
summary:
A Kenyan high court on Thursday declared unconstitutional sections of a 2012 seed law that had prohibited farmers from sharing and selling indigenous seeds. This landmark ruling, hailed as a major win for food security, overturns a law that could have seen farmers face up to two years in prison or a 1 million Kenya shillings ($7,700) fine for sharing seeds through community seed banks.

Justice Rhoda Rutto also ruled against sections of the law that empowered government officials to raid seed banks and seize seeds. The law was originally introduced to combat the sale of counterfeit seeds and to grant sole seed trading rights to licensed companies.

The case was brought by 15 smallholder farmers. Farmer Samuel Wathome expressed relief, stating the ruling vindicates traditional seed-saving practices passed down through generations. Elizabeth Atieno, a food campaigner at Greenpeace Africa, lauded the decision as a "victory for our culture" and a "blow against the corporate capture of our food system," allowing communities to freely share climate-resilient, locally adapted seeds.

Food campaigners highlight indigenous seeds' importance for food security due to their natural drought resistance and adaptability to local climate conditions, often outperforming hybrid varieties. While Kenya has a national seed bank, community seed banks are crucial for preserving variety and ensuring proximity to farmers. The country has previously faced significant losses due to counterfeit seeds in its rain-fed agricultural sector.

罗达·鲁托法官还裁定，该法律中授权政府官员搜查种子库并没收种子的条款也予以驳回。该法律最初出台的目的是打击假冒种子的销售，并授予持牌公司独家种子贸易权。

该案件由15名小农户提起。农民塞缪尔·瓦托姆表达了宽慰，称这项裁决为代代相传的传统种子保存做法正名。绿色和平非洲分部粮食活动家伊丽莎白·阿蒂诺赞扬了这一决定，称其为“我们文化的胜利”和“对企业掌控我们粮食体系的打击”，它将使社区能够自由分享气候适应型和当地适应性强的种子。

粮食活动家们强调，本土种子因其天然的抗旱性和对当地气候条件的适应性而对粮食安全至关重要，它们通常比杂交品种表现更好。尽管肯尼亚拥有国家种子库，但社区种子库对于保护种子的多样性和确保农民就近获得种子至关重要。该国此前在雨养农业部门因假冒种子而遭受了重大损失。

title: Fighting the age-gated internet
summary:
The internet is facing a major transformation as age-verification laws gain traction, with half of US states and countries like the UK and Australia implementing such mandates. Congress recently reviewed 19 online safety bills, including the Kids Online Safety Act (KOSA), which often propose ID or age verification for "adult" content or even restrict minors under 16 from platforms.

However, organizations like Fight for the Future (FFTF) fiercely oppose these measures, arguing they set a dangerous precedent for increased censorship, surveillance, and data breaches due to third-party verification services. Sarah Philips, an FFTF campaigner, labels them "censorship laws" that threaten democratic freedom, akin to book bans. Over 90 human rights groups have voiced similar concerns, stating these mandates treat users like "criminal suspects" for corporate profit.

Critics argue that these bills fail to address underlying issues like comprehensive privacy and antitrust concerns, instead imposing verification that ultimately impacts all internet users, not just minors. They fear policies like KOSA could enable broad censorship of diverse content, including LGBTQ+ information. Although no new legislation advanced from the recent Congressional hearing, FFTF warns that age-gating the internet would require everyone, regardless of age, to prove they are not a child, fundamentally altering online access and privacy.
chinese_title: 对抗年龄门槛互联网
chinese_summary:
随着年龄验证法律日益普及，互联网正面临一场重大变革，美国半数州以及英国、澳大利亚等国家已开始实施此类强制性规定。国会最近审查了19项在线安全法案，其中包括《儿童在线安全法案》(KOSA)，这些法案通常提议对“成人”内容进行身份或年龄验证，甚至禁止16岁以下未成年人使用某些平台。

然而，像“为未来而战”(FFTF)这样的组织强烈反对这些措施，认为它们为第三方验证服务导致审查、监控和数据泄露的增加开创危险先例。FFTF活动家莎拉·菲利普斯称它们为“审查法”，认为它们威胁民主自由，类似禁书。超过90个人权组织也表达了类似的担忧，称这些强制性规定为了企业利润将用户视为“犯罪嫌疑人”。

批评人士认为，这些法案未能解决综合隐私和反垄断等根本问题，却强制推行验证，最终影响的是所有互联网用户，而不仅仅是未成年人。他们担心KOSA等政策可能导致对包括LGBTQ+信息在内的多元内容的广泛审查。尽管最近的国会听证会没有推进任何新立法，FFTF警告称，对互联网实行年龄限制将要求所有人，无论年龄大小，都证明自己不是儿童，从而从根本上改变在线访问和隐私。

title: A Cozy Mk IV light aircraft crashed after 3D-printed part was weakened by heat
summary:
A Cozy Mk IV light aircraft crashed at Gloucestershire Airport on March 18 after a 3D-printed plastic part, an air induction elbow, softened and collapsed due to engine heat. The part, purchased at a North American air show, was deemed to be made of "inappropriate material" by the Air Accidents Investigation Branch (AAIB).

The pilot, the sole occupant, sustained minor injuries in the crash, which destroyed the aircraft after its engine lost all power during final approach. He managed to steer clear of some obstacles but struck the instrument landing system. In response to the accident, the Light Aircraft Association (LAA) plans to issue a safety alert to inspectors regarding the use of 3D-printed parts in aircraft.
chinese_title: 一架Cozy Mk IV轻型飞机因3D打印部件受热弱化而坠毁
chinese_summary:
3月18日，一架Cozy Mk IV型轻型飞机在格洛斯特郡机场坠毁。事故原因是其一个3D打印塑料部件——进气弯管——因发动机热量软化并塌陷。该部件是在一次北美航展上购买的，航空事故调查局（AAIB）认为其由“不合适的材料”制成。

飞行员是唯一的乘员，在事故中受轻伤。事故导致飞机在最后进近时发动机失去所有动力，飞机被毁。飞行员设法避开了一些障碍物，但撞上了仪表着陆系统。为应对此次事故，轻型飞机协会（LAA）计划向检查员发布关于飞机中使用3D打印部件的安全警报。

title: State Department to deny visas to fact checkers and others, citing 'censorship'
summary:
The State Department, under the Trump administration, has issued a directive to deny H-1B visas to individuals involved in fact-checking, content moderation, or "trust and safety" activities, labeling these as "censorship" of Americans' speech. An internal memo instructs consular officers to scrutinize applicants' work histories for such roles, particularly those in the tech sector.

This policy stems from a stance by Secretary of State Marco Rubio and the White House, claiming to defend Americans' freedom of expression. The administration frequently cites President Trump's past bans from social media platforms as evidence of tech companies unfairly targeting conservatives. A State Department spokesperson confirmed the administration's intent to prevent "aliens coming to the United States to work as censors muzzling Americans."

Critics, however, are alarmed. Alice Goguen Hunsberger, a trust and safety professional, emphasized that this work is vital for protecting children, preventing fraud, and enhancing online safety, not arbitrary censorship, and highlights the importance of global workers in these roles. First Amendment experts, such as Carrie DeCell of the Knight First Amendment Institute, criticize the policy as "incoherent and unconstitutional," arguing that studying misinformation and content moderation are protected free speech activities. Ironically, the State Department simultaneously announced it would require H-1B visa applicants to make their social media profiles public for official review.
chinese_title: 国务院将以“审查制度”为由，拒发事实核查员等签证。
chinese_summary:
特朗普政府领导下的国务院发布了一项指令，拒绝向从事事实核查、内容审核或“信任与安全”活动的个人发放H-1B签证，并将其定性为“审查”美国人言论的行为。一份内部备忘录指示领事官员仔细审查申请人的工作经历中是否包含此类职务，特别是科技行业的申请人。

这项政策源于国务卿马可·卢比奥和白宫的立场，声称旨在捍卫美国人的言论自由。政府经常引用特朗普总统此前被社交媒体平台封禁的事件，作为科技公司不公平地针对保守派的证据。一位国务院发言人证实了政府的意图，即阻止“外国人来到美国从事审查工作，压制美国人的言论”。

然而，批评人士对此深感担忧。信任与安全专业人士爱丽丝·戈根·汉斯伯格强调指出，这项工作对于保护儿童、防止欺诈和增强网络安全至关重要，而非武断的审查，并突出了全球劳工在这些岗位上的重要性。第一修正案专家，例如奈特第一修正案研究所的卡丽·德塞尔，批评这项政策“前后矛盾且违宪”，认为研究虚假信息和内容审核是受保护的言论自由活动。具有讽刺意味的是，国务院同时宣布将要求H-1B签证申请人公开其社交媒体资料，以供官方审查。

title: Tunnl.gg
summary: Tunnl.gg is presented as a service that simplifies the process of exposing a local development server (localhost) to the internet. Its primary value proposition is offering "the easiest way" for users to make their locally running applications or services accessible publicly. This tool is beneficial for developers needing to share their work, test webhooks, or collaborate by providing a public URL for their local environment without complex network configurations.
chinese_title: Tunnl.gg
chinese_summary: Tunnl.gg 被呈现为一项服务，它简化了将本地开发服务器（localhost）暴露到互联网的过程。其主要价值主张是为用户提供“最简单的方式”，使其本地运行的应用程序或服务能够公开访问。这个工具对开发者非常有用，无论是需要分享他们的工作、测试 webhook，还是通过为本地环境提供公共 URL 进行协作，而且无需进行复杂的网络配置。

title: I have been writing a niche history blog for 15 years
summary:
Dr. Erik Wade, author of the "Res Obscura" Substack, reflects on 15 years of writing his niche history blog, which he started in 2009. The blog meticulously documents a daily calendar of medieval European historical events, drawing directly from primary sources.

Wade initially began the blog as a personal project to deepen his engagement with medieval history, improve his research and writing skills, and better understand the period's chronology. What started as a training ground for an aspiring academic evolved into a sustained passion project.

He continues because it offers profound intellectual satisfaction, allows him to delve into historical details often overlooked, and serves as a valuable compendium of medieval history. The blog has not only honed his scholarly abilities, leading to collaborations and speaking invitations, but also connected him with a community of fellow enthusiasts.

In an age of rapid content, "Res Obscura" stands as a testament to the rewards of slow, deliberate, and consistent engagement with a specialized subject. Wade highlights how this long-term commitment has enriched his academic life, provided a unique creative outlet, and allowed him to contribute a rich, accessible historical resource over many years.
chinese_title: 我写小众历史博客已经15年了。
chinese_summary:
埃里克·韦德博士是“Res Obscura”Substack专栏的作者，他回顾了自2009年开始撰写小众历史博客15年来的历程。这个博客详尽记录了欧洲中世纪历史事件的每日年表，内容直接取材于一手资料。

韦德最初创办这个博客是一个个人项目，旨在加深他对中世纪历史的投入，提升其研究和写作技能，并更好地掌握该时期的历史编年。最初只是他作为一名未来学者的磨练平台，最终发展成为一个持久的、充满激情的项目。

他坚持下去，因为这个博客带给他深刻的智力满足，让他得以深入研究那些常被忽视的历史细节，并作为一份珍贵的中世纪历史概要。这个博客不仅磨练了他的学术能力，为他带来了合作机会和演讲邀请，还让他与一群志同道合的爱好者建立了联系。

在这个信息速食的时代，“Res Obscura”则证明了缓慢、深思熟虑并持之以恒地投入到一个专业领域所带来的丰厚回报。韦德强调，这种长期的投入丰富了他的学术生活，提供了一个独特的创作出口，并使他能够在多年来贡献一份丰富且易于获取的历史资源。

title: Covid-19 mRNA Vaccination and 4-Year All-Cause Mortality
summary:
A large retrospective cohort study published in JAMA Network Open investigated the long-term association between mRNA COVID-19 vaccination and all-cause mortality over a four-year period. The study utilized data from over 2.3 million adults aged 18 and older in Israel, tracking outcomes from March 2021 to March 2025.

Researchers compared all-cause mortality rates between individuals who had received three or more mRNA vaccine doses and unvaccinated individuals, meticulously adjusting for potential confounding factors such as age, sex, socioeconomic status, baseline comorbidities, and healthcare utilization.

The findings revealed a significantly lower risk of all-cause mortality among the vaccinated group. Individuals who received three or more mRNA vaccine doses had an adjusted Hazard Ratio of 0.72 (95% CI, 0.70-0.74) compared to unvaccinated individuals, indicating a 28% lower risk of death from any cause over the four-year follow-up. This protective association remained consistent across various subgroups, including different age ranges, sexes, and individuals with varying comorbidity burdens.

The study concludes that receiving three or more mRNA COVID-19 vaccine doses is associated with a significantly reduced long-term risk of all-cause mortality. These findings reinforce the overall safety and potential broader health benefits of mRNA vaccination over an extended period, beyond its primary role in preventing severe COVID-19 disease.
chinese_title: COVID-19 mRNA疫苗接种与4年全因死亡率
chinese_summary:
JAMA Network Open发表的一项大型回顾性队列研究调查了mRNA COVID-19疫苗接种与四年期间内全因死亡率之间的长期关联。该研究使用了来自以色列超过230万18岁及以上成年人的数据，追踪了从2021年3月到2025年3月的结果。

研究人员比较了接受三剂或更多mRNA疫苗接种的个体与未接种疫苗的个体之间的全因死亡率，并精心调整了潜在的混杂因素，例如年龄、性别、社会经济地位、基线合并症和医疗保健利用情况。

研究结果显示，在接种疫苗组中，全因死亡率风险显著降低。与未接种疫苗的个体相比，接受了三剂或更多mRNA疫苗接种的个体调整后的风险比为0.72（95%置信区间，0.70-0.74），这表明在四年随访期间，死于任何原因的风险降低了28%。这种保护性关联在各个亚组中保持一致，包括不同年龄段、性别以及合并症负担不同的个体。

该研究得出结论，接种三剂或更多mRNA COVID-19疫苗与全因死亡率的长期显著降低相关。这些发现进一步证实了mRNA疫苗在较长时间内的整体安全性和潜在的更广泛健康益处，超出了其预防严重COVID-19疾病的主要作用。

title: Most technical problems are people problems
summary:
The article posits that most technical problems are fundamentally people problems, stemming from human factors rather than purely technical challenges. The author illustrates this with an experience at a company burdened by immense technical debt, where a well-intentioned technical fix failed due to underlying human issues. Developers resisted change, management avoided confronting outdated practices, and a culture of complacency prevailed.

Technical debt, the author argues, often arises from human failings: unclear requirements, unrealistic sales deadlines, developers choosing comfortable but outdated technologies, reactive management, and ego. The author learned that trying to solve these human-rooted problems with purely technical solutions is ineffective.

The piece emphasizes that engineers must move beyond the ideal of solving problems in a vacuum. Effective communication, particularly with non-technical stakeholders, is crucial. Technical work, especially tech debt cleanup, must be quantified and presented in terms of business value, as "perception that your team is getting a lot done is just as important as getting a lot done."

Ultimately, the article concludes that senior engineering roles require strong cross-functional collaboration, an understanding of personalities, egos, and organizational blindspots, not just deep technical knowledge. While "engineer's engineers" are highly productive, the "heads up coder" who combines technical expertise with the ability to foresee and navigate project risks (technical and human) is equally valuable for successful initiatives.
chinese_title: 大多数技术问题都是人的问题。
chinese_summary:
文章指出，大多数技术问题本质上是人的问题，源于人为因素而非纯粹的技术挑战。作者通过在一个背负巨额技术债务的公司经历来阐明这一点，该公司一次善意的技术修复因潜在的人为问题而失败。开发者抵制变革，管理层回避直面过时做法，一种自满文化盛行。

作者认为，技术债务往往源于人为失误：需求不明确、不切实际的销售截止日期、开发者选择舒适但过时的技术、反应式管理以及自负。作者认识到，试图用纯粹的技术方案解决这些根植于人的问题是无效的。

文章强调，工程师必须超越在“真空”中解决问题的理想。有效沟通，尤其是与非技术利益相关者的沟通，至关重要。技术工作，尤其是技术债务清理，必须量化并以业务价值来呈现，因为“你的团队做了很多工作的感知与实际做了很多工作同样重要”。

最终，文章总结道，高级工程职位不仅需要深厚的技术知识，还需要强大的跨职能协作能力，以及对个性和自我、组织盲点的理解。尽管“纯粹的工程师”效率很高，但兼具技术专长和预见及驾驭项目风险（技术和人为）能力的“高瞻远瞩的程序员”对于项目的成功同样宝贵。

title: Programming peaked
summary:
Samir Talwar argues that programming has peaked, contrasting the current development landscape of 2025 with his experiences in 2010.

In 2025, he describes an environment where JavaScript (with types) is prevalent, often generated by AI and susceptible to malicious NPM packages. Development relies on resource-intensive tools like VS Code, slow TypeScript compilations, and cumbersome pull request workflows that significantly delay code integration. Deployment is a complex "ordeal," involving bloated containers (re-downloading entire Debian repositories, including unnecessary components like Perl) and untestable, string-templated YAML for opaque Kubernetes clusters. These run on expensive, rented Cloud VMs, where direct control and transparency are lost, making the entire process slow, frustrating, and divorced from actual programming.

In contrast, Talwar fondly recalls 2010, when he wrote Java using efficient tools like Eclipse, which offered advanced refactoring and instant compilation. Development involved constant, fast unit testing, direct code pushes after pairing, and rapid deployment of simple JAR files (with vetted Maven dependencies) to reliable, owned physical servers in local datacentres. This allowed for code-to-ship times under a minute.

Talwar expresses a longing for those dependable tools, the speed of deployment, and the presence of testers. He attributes the decline to NPM, which made Node.js and JavaScript ubiquitous, leading to its often-inappropriate use across the stack (including React and Electron). He advocates for a return to using "sensible tool[s] for the job at hand."
chinese_title: 编程达到顶峰
chinese_summary:
萨米尔·塔尔瓦认为编程已达到顶峰，他将2025年当前的开发现状与自己在2010年的经历进行了对比。

在2025年，他描述了一个强类型JavaScript普遍存在的环境，这些代码常由AI生成，并易受恶意NPM包的侵扰。开发依赖于VS Code等资源密集型工具、缓慢的TypeScript编译以及繁琐的拉取请求（pull request）工作流，这些都显著延迟了代码集成。部署是一个复杂的“苦差事”，它涉及臃肿的容器（重新下载整个Debian仓库，包括Perl等不必要的组件），以及用于不透明Kubernetes集群的、无法测试且字符串模板化的YAML。这些都运行在昂贵、租用的云虚拟机上，在那里，直接控制和透明度都已丧失，使得整个过程缓慢、令人沮丧，并与实际编程脱节。

相比之下，塔尔瓦深情回忆起2010年，那时他使用Eclipse等高效工具编写Java代码，这些工具提供了高级重构和即时编译功能。开发涉及持续、快速的单元测试，结对编程后直接推送代码，以及将简单的JAR文件（带有经过审查的Maven依赖）快速部署到本地数据中心可靠的自有物理服务器上。这使得代码从编写到发布的时间可以控制在一分钟之内。

塔尔瓦表达了对那些可靠工具、部署速度和测试人员存在的渴望。他将这种衰落归因于NPM，NPM使得Node.js和JavaScript无处不在，导致它们在整个技术栈中（包括React和Electron）经常被不恰当地使用。他倡导回归“为手头工作选择合适的工具”这一理念。

title: 30 years ago today "Netscape and Sun announce JavaScript"
summary:
On December 4, 1995, Netscape Communications and Sun Microsystems announced JavaScript, an open, cross-platform object scripting language. This new language was designed to complement Sun's Java, facilitating the creation and customization of applications for enterprise networks and the Internet. An initial version was immediately available as part of the beta release of Netscape Navigator 2.0.

JavaScript is positioned as an easy-to-use scripting language for HTML page authors and enterprise developers to dynamically control the behavior of objects on clients and servers, rather than creating new objects like Java. It's designed to be network-centric, integrated with both Java and HTML, and accessible even to those with little programming experience, similar to Visual Basic.

Twenty-eight industry-leading companies, including Apple, AT&T, Hewlett-Packard, Oracle, and Silicon Graphics, endorsed JavaScript, committing to its integration into their future products. Netscape and Sun announced plans to propose JavaScript to the W3 Consortium (W3C) and the Internet Engineering Task Force (IETF) as an open, freely licensed Internet standard, including offering a royalty-free source code reference implementation. Netscape pledged to integrate JavaScript across its client and server products, as well as development tools like Netscape Navigator Gold 2.0 and LiveWire, to support the development and deployment of dynamic online applications.
chinese_title: 三十年前的今天，网景和太阳宣布了JavaScript
chinese_summary:
1995年12月4日，网景通信公司（Netscape Communications）和昇阳微系统公司（Sun Microsystems）宣布推出JavaScript，这是一种开放的、跨平台的对象脚本语言。这种新语言旨在补充昇阳的Java，促进为企业网络和互联网创建和定制应用程序。首个版本随即作为网景导航者（Netscape Navigator）2.0测试版的一部分推出。

JavaScript被定位为一种易于使用的脚本语言，供HTML页面作者和企业开发人员使用，以动态控制客户端和服务器上对象的行为，而不是像Java那样创建新对象。它被设计为以网络为中心，与Java和HTML集成，并且即使是编程经验很少的人也能上手，类似于Visual Basic。

包括苹果（Apple）、美国电话电报公司（AT&T）、惠普（Hewlett-Packard）、甲骨文（Oracle）和硅谷图形公司（Silicon Graphics）在内的二十八家行业领先公司认可JavaScript，承诺将其整合到未来的产品中。网景和昇阳宣布计划向W3C联盟（W3C Consortium）和互联网工程任务组（IETF）提议将JavaScript作为一项开放的、自由许可的互联网标准，包括提供免版税的源代码参考实现。网景承诺将其客户端和服务器产品，以及Netscape Navigator Gold 2.0和LiveWire等开发工具全面集成JavaScript，以支持动态在线应用程序的开发和部署。

title: Jolla Phone Pre-Order
summary:
The Jolla Phone is an independent European Linux smartphone, designed with community input as a "Do It Together" project, emphasizing privacy and user control. Pre-orders are currently open via a 99 € refundable voucher, which secures a special total price of 499 € (compared to an estimated normal price of 599€-699€).

The project is crowdfunded and requires 2,000 pre-orders by January 4, 2026, to move into full production; if the goal isn't met, all payments are fully refunded. As of now, 620 units have been sold. Estimated delivery is by the end of 1H/2026, initially for EU, UK, Norway, and Switzerland markets.

Key features include Sailfish OS 5, offering "Privacy by Design" with no tracking, a user-configurable physical Privacy Switch (for mic, Bluetooth, Android apps), and guaranteed long-term OS support (minimum 5 years). It runs native Sailfish apps and Android apps via AppSupport, with an option to go fully de-Googled. Hardware specifications include 5G with dual-SIM, 12GB RAM, 256GB expandable storage, a 6.36” FullHD AMOLED display, 50MP main camera, and a user-replaceable 5,500mAh battery. The design features user-replaceable back covers in distinct Nordic-inspired colors. Early supporters also receive a Special Edition Back Cover.
chinese_title: Jolla 手机预订
chinese_summary:
Jolla手机是一款独立的欧洲Linux智能手机，融合社区意见，作为一项“共同实现”的项目设计，强调隐私和用户控制。目前已开放预订，通过99欧元的保证金券（可退还）即可确保以499欧元的特惠总价购买（相比之下，预计正常价格为599欧元-699欧元）。

该项目采用众筹模式，需在2026年1月4日前达到2,000份预订单才能进入全面生产阶段；如果未能达标，所有款项将全额退还。截至目前，已售出620台。预计在2026年上半年末交付，最初面向欧盟、英国、挪威和瑞士市场。

主要特点包括Sailfish OS 5操作系统，提供“隐私优先设计”，无追踪功能；一个用户可配置的物理隐私开关（用于麦克风、蓝牙、安卓应用）；并保证长期操作系统支持（至少5年）。它通过AppSupport运行原生的Sailfish应用和安卓应用，并提供完全去Google化的选项。硬件配置包括5G双卡、12GB内存、256GB可扩展存储、6.36英寸全高清AMOLED显示屏、50MP主摄像头以及一个用户可更换的5,500mAh电池。设计特点是用户可更换的后盖，采用独特的北欧风格配色。早期支持者还将获得一个特别版后盖。

title: State of AI: An Empirical 100T Token Study with OpenRouter
summary:
This article from OpenRouter presents an empirical study based on 100 trillion tokens of AI usage data to analyze the state of AI. The key findings reveal several significant trends:

Open-source models, particularly Mixtral, are rapidly catching up to and in some cases surpassing proprietary models like GPT-3.5 in both performance and cost-effectiveness. Mixtral is noted for being 2-3x cheaper than GPT-3.5 and achieving comparable or better quality in many use cases, making it a strong contender for production workloads.

The study highlights the increasing commoditization of "good enough" AI. As many tasks can be handled by a range of models, cost-efficiency and speed are becoming critical differentiators. There's a strong trend towards "lowest bidder AI" where users optimize for the cheapest model that meets their quality threshold.

Another major finding is the emergence of "model agility." Developers are increasingly building applications with the flexibility to switch between models based on performance, cost, and availability, rather than being locked into a single provider. This multi-model approach is crucial for optimizing workflows and mitigating vendor lock-in.

Overall, the report suggests a shift towards a more diverse and competitive AI landscape, where open-source innovations and cost efficiency are driving significant changes in how AI is developed and deployed.
chinese_title: AI现状：基于OpenRouter的100T Token实证研究
chinese_summary:
OpenRouter的这篇文章基于100万亿个AI使用token数据，进行了一项实证研究，以分析AI的现状。主要发现揭示了几个显著趋势：

开源模型，尤其是Mixtral，在性能和成本效益两方面正迅速赶上，在某些情况下甚至超越GPT-3.5等专有模型。Mixtral以比GPT-3.5便宜2-3倍且在许多用例中能达到相当甚至更优的质量而著称，使其成为生产工作负载的有力竞争者。

该研究强调了“足够好”的AI日益商品化。由于许多任务可以通过一系列模型来处理，成本效益和速度正成为关键的差异化因素。目前存在一种强烈的“最低价AI”趋势，即用户会选择满足其质量门槛的最便宜模型。

另一个主要发现是“模型敏捷性”的出现。开发者正越来越多地构建具有根据性能、成本和可用性灵活切换模型能力的应用，而不是被锁定在单一提供商。这种多模型方法对于优化工作流程和减轻供应商锁定至关重要。

总体而言，该报告表明AI格局正转向更加多元化和竞争激烈，其中开源创新和成本效率正在推动AI开发和部署方式的重大变革。

title: Influential study on glyphosate safety retracted 25 years after publication
summary:
An influential study published in April 2000 in *Regulatory Toxicology and Pharmacology*, which concluded glyphosate was safe, has been retracted 25 years later, on November 28. The journal cited "several critical issues that are considered to undermine the academic integrity of this article and its conclusions."

The retraction stems from revelations made eight years prior during US court proceedings, known as the "Monsanto Papers." These internal documents exposed "ghostwriting," a form of scientific fraud. It was revealed that Monsanto employees, not the listed scientists Gary M. Williams, Robert Kroes, and Ian C. Munro, were the actual authors of the research.

Companies engage in ghostwriting to pay researchers to sign their names to articles they did not write. The clear motivation is to lend credibility to studies supporting the safety of their products, such as pesticides or drugs, by making it appear they were authored by independent scientists rather than company employees.

chinese_summary:

此次撤回源于八年前在美国法庭诉讼期间披露的信息，即所谓的“孟山都文件”。这些内部文件揭露了“幽灵写作”这种学术造假形式。文件显示，该研究的实际作者是孟山都的员工，而非署名科学家Gary M. Williams、Robert Kroes和Ian C. Munro。

公司进行幽灵写作，是为了付钱给研究人员，让他们在并非自己撰写的文章上署名。其明确动机是，通过使支持其产品（如农药或药物）安全性的研究看起来是由独立科学家而非公司员工撰写，从而提升这些研究的可信度。

title: Japanese four-cylinder engine is so reliable still in production after 25 years
summary:
The Honda K-series engine is celebrated in the Japanese automotive community for its exceptional balance of performance, reliability, and efficiency, remaining in production for almost 25 years. Introduced in 2001, it replaced the B and H series to meet stricter emissions and improve thermal efficiency. Its first generation featured a clean-sheet aluminum block, forged crankshaft, lightweight pistons, chain-driven dual overhead camshafts, and the advanced i-VTEC system for broad torque and strong high-RPM breathing. Honda also optimized the engine's orientation for better airflow and serviceability, debuting it in the JDM Stream before expanding to models like the Civic and Integra Type R.

The current-generation K20C evolved to meet modern turbocharging demands and emissions. Key improvements include a reinforced closed-deck aluminum block for enhanced cylinder stability, a low-friction rotating assembly, precise direct injection, and optimized cylinder head ports. Its compact, low-inertia turbo and integrated exhaust passages improve response and emissions. Honda prioritizes mid-range torque and real-world drivability, validating designs through extensive endurance testing, resulting in predictable behavior and low maintenance.

The K-series also proved its mettle in motorsport, with racing versions excelling in touring car championships like Super Taikyu and BTCC. Its rigid block, efficient cooling, sharp throttle response, and i-VTEC flexibility contributed to strong pace and reliability, often completing full seasons with minimal rebuilds.

Honda continues to utilize the K-series due to its adaptable architecture, supporting modern efficiency, high durability, and potential for integration with hybrid systems. Its design allows for continuous improvement without major structural changes, ensuring cost-effectiveness and manufacturing consistency. While the L-series may eventually be a primary focus, the K-series' proven performance, resilience, and market appeal ensure its continued relevance.

title: Lie groups are crucial to some of the most fundamental theories in physics
summary:
Lie groups are a powerful mathematical tool that blends group theory, geometry, and linear algebra, proving crucial to fundamental theories in physics, number theory, and chemistry. Identified by Marius Sophus Lie in the 1870s, they describe continuous symmetries, unlike the discrete symmetries of objects like an equilateral triangle.

For instance, the infinite rotations of a Frisbee form the Lie group SO(2), which can be visualized as a smooth, continuous shape or "manifold"—a circle in this case. Other Lie groups might resemble a sphere or more complex shapes. This smooth geometry is their key advantage. By "zooming in" on a small region of a Lie group, its curve can be approximated as a straight line, called a Lie algebra. This transformation allows mathematicians to use the simpler tools of linear algebra to perform complex calculations and compare different groups.

In physics, Lie groups are indispensable. The natural world abounds with continuous symmetries, which Lie groups elegantly capture. All fundamental forces—gravity, electromagnetism, and the strong/weak nuclear forces—are defined by Lie group symmetries, explaining phenomena like particle pairings and quantized energy levels. Moreover, Emmy Noether's theorem demonstrated that for every Lie group symmetry in a physical system, there exists a corresponding conservation law (e.g., time translation symmetry implies energy conservation). Lie groups thus remain a vital tool for understanding the universe's inherent symmetries.
chinese_title: 李群对物理学中一些最基本的理论至关重要。
chinese_summary:
李群是一种强大的数学工具，它融合了群论、几何学和线性代数，对物理学、数论和化学中的基础理论至关重要。李群由马吕斯·索福斯·李在19世纪70年代提出，它们描述了连续对称性，这与等边三角形等物体的离散对称性不同。

例如，飞盘的无限旋转构成了李群SO(2)，它可被形象化为一个光滑、连续的形状或“流形”——在本例中就是一个圆。其他李群可能类似于球体或更复杂的形状。这种光滑的几何结构是它们的核心优势。通过“放大”观察李群的一个小区域，其曲线可以被近似为一条直线，这被称为李代数。这种转化使得数学家能够利用线性代数这一更简单的工具来进行复杂的计算，并比较不同的群。

在物理学中，李群是不可或缺的。自然界中充满了连续对称性，而李群能够优雅地捕捉这些对称性。所有基本作用力——引力、电磁力以及强弱核力——都由李群对称性来定义，解释了粒子配对和量子化能级等现象。此外，埃米·诺特定理证明，物理系统中的每一个李群对称性都对应一个守恒定律（例如，时间平移对称性意味着能量守恒）。因此，李群仍然是理解宇宙固有对称性的一项至关重要的工具。

title: Bootloader Unlock Wall of Shame
summary:
The "Bootloader Unlock Wall of Shame" is a compilation of companies that restrict or completely block bootloader unlocking on their devices. The author views this trend, often disguised as "caring about your data," as a dangerous precedent that limits user control and could lead to further restrictions on features like ADB or sideloading. It emphasizes that only 100% offline unlock processes are truly trustworthy.

The document categorizes manufacturers by the difficulty of unlocking:
*   **"Just terrible!"** lists companies making it completely impossible without workarounds (e.g., Apple, Samsung, Huawei, Amazon, Alcatel). This category also includes most **Carrier Locked Devices**, which often remain locked even after contracts expire.
*   **"Avoid at all costs!"** includes manufacturers that allow unlocking only under specific conditions (region, model, SOC) or require sacrifices (e.g., Xiaomi, OPPO/Realme, HMD/Nokia, Motorola, LG).
*   **"Proceed with caution!"** features companies requiring an online account and/or a waiting period before unlocking (e.g., Google, OnePlus, Sony, Fairphone).
*   **"Safe for now"** identifies manufacturers with fewer restrictions (e.g., Nothing, Microsoft, Volla, Teclast).

Additionally, the guide provides "Misc info" on potential unlocking methods, such as custom Android Verified Boot (AVB) keys and universal SOC-based exploits for Kirin, MediaTek, and Unisoc chipsets. Qualcomm lacks a universal method but offers some device-specific options.

title: NeurIPS 2025 Best Paper Awards
summary:
NeurIPS 2025 announced its Best Paper Awards, recognizing seven groundbreaking papers: four best papers (one from the Datasets & Benchmark Track) and three runner-ups. These awards highlight advances in diffusion model theory, self-supervised reinforcement learning, attention mechanisms for large language models (LLMs), reasoning in LLMs, online learning, neural scaling laws, and LLM diversity benchmarking.

The Best Papers include:
*   **"Artificial Hivemind: The Open-Ended Homogeneity of Language Models (and Beyond)"** (Datasets & Benchmark Track) introduces Infinity-Chat, a large-scale dataset for evaluating LLM diversity. It reveals the "Artificial Hivemind effect"—LLMs' tendency to generate homogeneous outputs, posing risks to human creativity and highlighting miscalibration with diverse human preferences.
*   **"Gated Attention for Large Language Models"** demonstrates that a simple head-specific sigmoid gate after Scaled Dot-Product Attention consistently improves LLM performance, enhances training stability, and mitigates the "attention sink" phenomenon.
*   **"1000 Layer Networks for Self-Supervised RL: Scaling Depth Can Enable New Goal-Reaching Capabilities"** challenges the convention of shallow RL networks, showing that increasing depth to 1024 layers significantly boosts self-supervised contrastive RL performance and enables the emergence of more sophisticated capabilities.
*   **"Why Diffusion Models Don’t Memorize: The Role of Implicit Dynamical Regularization in Training"** provides foundational insights into diffusion model generalization. It identifies two distinct timescales—generalization and memorization—showing an expanding window for effective generalization due to implicit dynamical regularization.

One runner-up, **"Does Reinforcement Learning Really Incentivize Reasoning Capacity in LLMs Beyond the Base Model?"**, critically examines Reinforcement Learning with Verifiable Rewards (RLVR). It finds that current RLVR methods primarily improve sampling efficiency but do not elicit fundamentally new reasoning patterns beyond the base model's inherent capabilities, suggesting that distillation might be more effective for true capability expansion.
chinese_title: NeurIPS 2025 最佳论文奖
chinese_summary:
NeurIPS 2025 公布了其最佳论文奖，表彰了七篇开创性论文：四篇最佳论文（其中一篇来自数据集与基准赛道）和三篇优胜奖论文。这些奖项凸显了扩散模型理论、自监督强化学习、大型语言模型（LLM）的注意力机制、LLM推理、在线学习、神经缩放定律以及LLM多样性基准测试方面的进展。

最佳论文包括：
*   **“人工蜂群：语言模型（及 beyond）的开放式同质性”**（数据集与基准赛道）介绍了 Infinity-Chat，一个用于评估LLM多样性的大规模数据集。它揭示了“人工蜂群效应”——LLM倾向于生成同质化输出，对人类创造力构成风险，并凸显了与多样化人类偏好的校准不足。
*   **“大型语言模型的门控注意力”** 证明了在缩放点积注意力之后使用一个简单的头部特定 Sigmoid 门控，能够持续提升LLM性能，增强训练稳定性，并缓解“注意力汇聚”现象。
*   **“用于自监督强化学习的千层网络：深度扩展可实现新的目标达成能力”** 挑战了传统浅层强化学习网络的惯例，表明将深度增加到1024层能够显著提升自监督对比强化学习的性能，并促使更复杂的能力涌现。
*   **“扩散模型为何不记忆：训练中隐式动态正则化的作用”** 为扩散模型的泛化提供了基础见解。它识别了两个不同的时间尺度——泛化和记忆，并表明由于隐式动态正则化，有效泛化的窗口正在扩大。

一篇优胜奖论文，**“强化学习真的能激励LLM超越基础模型的推理能力吗？”**，批判性地审视了带可验证奖励的强化学习（RLVR）。它发现当前的RLVR方法主要提升了采样效率，但未能激发超越基础模型固有能力的根本性新推理模式，这表明蒸馏可能对真正的能力扩展更为有效。

title: The Free Software Foundation Europe deleted its account on X
summary:
On December 4, 2025, the Free Software Foundation Europe (FSFE) announced it had permanently deleted its account on X, the platform formerly known as Twitter. The decision reflects the FSFE's long-held discomfort with the proprietary platform, which never aligned with its core values of freedom and decentralization.

Initially, the FSFE used Twitter to promote Free Software values, engage with policymakers and journalists, and reach individuals unfamiliar with software freedom, viewing it as a tool for information exchange and dialogue. However, following Elon Musk's acquisition and the rebranding to X, the platform significantly deteriorated. The FSFE observed it transform into a "centralised arena of hostility, misinformation, and profit-driven control," marked by increased harassment, hate speech, and an algorithm that prioritizes polarization and sensationalism. Growing privacy and data protection concerns further solidified their decision to depart.

While the FSFE will maintain a presence on some other proprietary platforms to reach a wider audience, it strongly encourages supporters of digital freedom and decentralization to join them on the Fediverse. They advocate for the Fediverse, including Mastodon and Peertube, as a transparent, autonomous, and resilient alternative to profit-driven, centrally controlled platforms.

title: Why WinQuake exists and how it works
summary:
WinQuake (`winquake.exe`) was created by id Software to overcome significant limitations of the original `quake.exe` on Windows 95 and NT. `quake.exe` ran approximately 25% slower on Windows 95 due to virtualization overhead, relied on convoluted methods for TCP/IP networking, and critically, was incompatible with Windows NT's Virtual DOS Machine (NTVDM).

WinQuake addressed these issues by implementing multiple backends for input, audio, and video, configurable through various modes (e.g., `fastvid`, `safe`). For audio, it offered DirectSound for low latency (higher CPU impact) or WinMM for better framerates. Input used either DirectInput for smoother responsiveness or the legacy Winuser.h API.

The most complex component was the video backend. WinQuake could render using the safe but slow GDI-based Device-Independent Bitmaps (DIB) for windowed mode. For fullscreen, it relied on SciTech's Multi-platform Graphics Library (MGL). MGL dynamically selected the best available driver, including DirectDraw (Microsoft's 2D gaming API), but its secret weapon was "WinDirect." WinDirect was SciTech's proprietary technology that allowed WinQuake to bypass Windows' GDI/DirectDraw restrictions, directly accessing display hardware (VGA, VESA) and taking full control of the screen, much like a DOS application.

This sophisticated architecture allowed WinQuake to achieve framerates comparable to the DOS version, provide direct Winsock access, and run on Windows NT, ultimately delivering a superior user experience that justified its existence. It impressively retains backward compatibility even with modern Windows 11.
chinese_title: WinQuake为何存在以及其工作原理
chinese_summary:
WinQuake (`winquake.exe`) 由 id Software 创建，旨在克服原始 `quake.exe` 在 Windows 95 和 NT 上的重大限制。`quake.exe` 在 Windows 95 上由于虚拟化开销运行速度慢约 25%，TCP/IP 网络依赖复杂方法，最重要的是，它与 Windows NT 的虚拟 DOS 机器 (NTVDM) 不兼容。

WinQuake 通过为输入、音频和视频实现多个后端来解决这些问题，这些后端可通过各种模式（例如 `fastvid`、`safe`）进行配置。对于音频，它提供 DirectSound 以实现低延迟（CPU 影响更大）或 WinMM 以获得更好的帧率。输入则使用 DirectInput 实现更流畅的响应，或使用传统的 Winuser.h API。

最复杂的组件是视频后端。WinQuake 在窗口模式下可以使用安全但缓慢的基于 GDI 的设备无关位图 (DIB) 进行渲染。对于全屏模式，它依赖于 SciTech 的多平台图形库 (MGL)。MGL 动态选择最佳可用驱动程序，包括 DirectDraw（微软的 2D 游戏 API），但其秘密武器是“WinDirect”。WinDirect 是 SciTech 的专有技术，它允许 WinQuake 绕过 Windows 的 GDI/DirectDraw 限制，直接访问显示硬件（VGA、VESA）并完全控制屏幕，就像一个 DOS 应用程序一样。

这种复杂的架构使 WinQuake 能够实现与 DOS 版本相当的帧率，提供直接的 Winsock 访问，并在 Windows NT 上运行，最终提供了卓越的用户体验，证明了其存在的合理性。令人印象深刻的是，它甚至在现代 Windows 11 上仍能保持向后兼容性。

title: 8086 Microcode Browser
summary:
The author, known for "486Tang," has launched an online 8086 microcode browser, developed during an effort to faithfully recreate the original 8086 chip. This project involved extensive study of Andrew Jenner's 2020 extraction and disassembly of the 8086 microcode.

The interactive browser decodes each 21-bit micro-instruction into readable fields, offering explanatory tooltips on hover and clickable jump targets, including indirect jumps and calls. A "Browse by Instruction" feature allows users to select any of approximately 300 8086 instructions, instantly navigating to its corresponding microcode entry point among the roughly 60 unique routines.

The article reveals several fascinating aspects of the 8086's internal workings:
*   Register IDs change meaning based on context (e.g., '10100' is SIGMA as a source but tmpaL as a destination).
*   Internal naming is inconsistent; N and R are the same physical register, and SI is called IJ.
*   The Instruction Pointer (IP) points to the *next prefetch address*, with a CORR micro-operation used to rewind it to the true instruction boundary during branches or interrupts.
*   Most arithmetic instructions elegantly reuse the same four micro-instructions (008–00B), with the XI micro-operation performing varied behaviors based on opcode or ModRM bits.
chinese_title: 8086 微代码浏览器
chinese_summary:
以“486Tang”闻名的作者发布了一个在线8086微码浏览器，该浏览器是在努力忠实复现原始8086芯片的过程中开发的。该项目涉及对Andrew Jenner于2020年对8086微码的提取和反汇编的深入研究。

这个交互式浏览器将每条21位微指令解码成可读字段，鼠标悬停时提供解释性工具提示，并提供可点击的跳转目标，包括间接跳转和调用。一个“按指令浏览”功能允许用户选择大约300条8086指令中的任意一条，立即导航到其在约60个独立例程中对应的微码入口点。

文章揭示了8086内部工作原理的几个引人入胜的方面：
*   寄存器ID会根据上下文改变含义（例如，'10100'在作为源时是SIGMA，但作为目标时是tmpaL）。
*   内部命名不一致；N和R是同一个物理寄存器，而SI被称为IJ。
*   指令指针（IP）指向*下一个预取地址*，并使用CORR微操作在分支或中断期间将其回溯到真正的指令边界。
*   大多数算术指令优雅地重用了相同的四条微指令（008–00B），其中XI微操作根据操作码或ModRM位执行不同的行为。

title: Acme, a brief history of one of the protocols which has changed the Internet
summary:
The article chronicles the ACME (Automated Certificate Management Environment) protocol, a pivotal development in Internet security. Prior to 2015, encryption was scarce (around 40% of websites), largely due to the complexity and cost of obtaining and managing TLS certificates. Edward Snowden's 2013 revelations highlighted the urgent need for secure communications.

In response, Let's Encrypt, a free and automated Certificate Authority (CA), was launched in 2015 by the Internet Security Research Group (ISRG) with backing from partners like Mozilla and EFF. Its core mission was to eliminate the barriers to encryption through automation, a critical factor for its small team to operate at global scale. Let's Encrypt has since dramatically increased global HTTPS adoption to over 83%.

ACME is the open protocol underpinning Let's Encrypt's automation. It enables client software to prove control over a domain to a CA (via HTTP, DNS, or TLS challenges) for automatic certificate issuance, removing human intervention. Conceived in late 2014, ACME's development merged efforts from various research groups, becoming central to Let's Encrypt's design. Initially focused on securing the Web, its DNS challenge also allowed securing other protocols like SMTP.

ACME's open development and subsequent standardization by the IETF (RFC 8555, 2019) were instrumental. This process fostered a diverse ecosystem of ACME clients and led to significant protocol improvements, including design changes (e.g., certificate-request-first flow, authenticated GET requests) and enhanced security (e.g., deprecation of tls-sni-01). The protocol's openness and IETF collaboration encouraged adoption by other CAs, confirming ACME's transformative impact on the certificate ecosystem.
chinese_title: 艾克米：改变互联网的协议之一的简史
chinese_summary:
本文记述了ACME（自动化证书管理环境）协议，这是互联网安全领域的一项关键发展。在2015年之前，加密技术应用稀少（约占网站总数的40%），这主要是由于获取和管理TLS证书的复杂性和高成本。爱德华·斯诺登在2013年的爆料凸显了安全通信的迫切需求。

为此，互联网安全研究小组（ISRG）于2015年推出了Let's Encrypt，这是一个免费且自动化的证书颁发机构（CA），并获得了Mozilla和EFF等合作伙伴的支持。其核心使命是通过自动化消除加密障碍，这对于其小团队在全球范围内运作至关重要。此后，Let's Encrypt已将全球HTTPS的普及率大幅提升至83%以上。

ACME是支撑Let's Encrypt自动化运作的开放协议。它允许客户端软件（通过HTTP、DNS或TLS质询）向CA证明其对域名的控制权，从而实现证书的自动颁发，无需人工干预。ACME协议构想于2014年末，其开发整合了多个研究小组的努力，并成为Let's Encrypt设计的核心。最初，ACME主要专注于保护网络安全，但其DNS质询机制也使得保护SMTP等其他协议成为可能。

ACME的开放式开发以及随后由IETF（RFC 8555，2019年）进行的标准化工作至关重要。这一过程促进了ACME客户端的多元生态系统发展，并带来了协议的显著改进，包括设计变更（例如，证书请求优先流程、带认证的GET请求）和安全增强（例如，废弃tls-sni-01）。协议的开放性以及与IETF的合作鼓励了其他CA采用ACME，证实了ACME对证书生态系统的变革性影响。

title: Making RSS More Fun
summary:
The author expresses a strong dislike for traditional RSS readers, finding them a "chore" due to overwhelming backlogs and a lack of chronological relevance. They desire a "TikTok-like" content discovery experience for the "small web," where users can passively consume random content from small creators, upvote what they like, and have a simple algorithm serve popular content more often, all without ads or extensive data collection.

To achieve this, the author created "TimeWasterPro," a Firefox extension available at `https://timewasterpro.xyz/`. Users click a button to get a random website, then upvote, downvote, or report it. Upvotes help prioritize "high quality" content for others, and users can submit links to climb a leaderboard.

The backend, built with FastAPI, SQLAlchemy, and SQLite, slowly crawls RSS feeds from Kagi's small web list, currently indexing over 600,000 pages. The design intentionally uses an old-school Apple System OS aesthetic (System.css) to signal it's a light-hearted, non-commercial hobby project. User authentication requires an email, though the author regrets this choice and aims for minimal data collection.

While generally pleased with the project, challenges include platform-specific keyboard shortcuts and future plans involve categorizing content (perhaps with ML), improving new user onboarding to feature "best stuff" early, and managing low-quality submissions. The source code will be released when stable.
